snippet: Despite the fact that the spending plans will be miles apart ideologically, there are signs that some sort of compromise might be possible.
abstract: Signs of some sort of compromise might be emerging in Congress, as lawmakers in both Senate and House begin taking first steps toward more structured and orderly budget process; development marks start what both parties hope is move away from vicious cycle of deadline-driven fixes.
lead_paragraph: Despite the fact that the spending plans will be miles apart ideologically, there are signs that some sort of compromise might be possible.

headline.seo: House and Senate Work Simultaneously to Create Budgets
headline.main: House and Senate Work Simultaneously to Create Budgets, a Rarity
headline.print_headline: House and Senate Work Simultaneously to Create Budgets, a Rarity
